p: Previous analyses of EOs composition in indigenous populations of S. officinalis identified chemotypes that only partly correspond to our findings. α-Thujone and β-thujone, and their relationship, were often recognized as two compounds characterizing chemiotypes, often in contrast to camphor combined to other compounds. Jug-Dujaković et al. [ 9] found out three chemiotypes based on α-thujone, β-thujone, and camphor/β-pinene/borneol/bornyl acetate in Croatia.
